name: Element's Fusion
description:
This game was created form the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Join the elements to gain new powers!

We'd love to have more levels with challenging puzzles, as well as improve the game elements mechanics, but in 48h this is what we could come up with. Please suport us to more :)

Play with mouse and AWSD keys and Mouse (You can reset the level by clickng on the red button)

There's currently a bug on the Desktop download version, it is skiping a couple of stages, but the browser version is working fine.
